org.openscience.cdk.interfaces

Interface IReactionSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, ICDKObject, IChemObject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IReactionScheme
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebugReactionScheme, DebugReactionSet, NNReactionScheme, NNReactionSet, ReactionChain, ReactionScheme, ReactionSet

    public interface IReactionSet
extends IChemObject
    A set of reactions, for example those taking part in a reaction.
    Keywords:
    reaction
    Belongs to CDK module:
    interfaces
    Source code:
    HEAD
